name: Tru00s
0:
”Alexa, open true noughties radio”
”Alexa, start true noughties radio”
”Alexa, play true noughties radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true noughties radio
des: Dive into the new millennium with Tru00s, where pop culture and music collided in a digital explosion. This is the era that brought you the rise of reality TV, the domination of boy bands, and the birth of social media. Our station is a time capsule of the decade’s biggest hits, from the catchy pop anthems of Britney Spears to the groundbreaking hip-hop of Eminem. We celebrate the diversity of the 00s, from the emo wave to the reggaeton revolution. Tune in for the tracks that made you download, the ballads that made you text, and the hooks that are still stuck in your head. This is your soundtrack for the 00s - where every hit is a throwback.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
